alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 11:07AM MST until January 05 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Up to 4 inches over Lookout Pass. * WHERE...Highway 2 Kalispell to Libby, Evaro Hill, Highway 93 Eureka to Whitefish, Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, Highway 37 Eureka to Libby, Highway 56 Bull Lake Road, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, and Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region
